ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was part of the DNA Waterscan project funded by the Gieskes-Strijbis Fonds. We thank Bram Koese and NGO EIS for providing verified crayfish data, Maarten van â€˜t Zelfde for GIS support and Paula dos Reis Oliveira and anonymous reviewers for constructive manuscript feedback.
